drink_desc: Our crisp, Strawberry Acai Refreshers® Beverage, with its accents of passion fruit, is combined with creamy Coconutmilk. It’s a fruity and refreshing sip of spring, no matter what time of year.

As delicious as it is gorgeous. This refreshing Ombré Pink Drink combines our light, fruity Cool Lime Starbucks Refreshers™ Beverage with cool, creamy coconutmilk and a splash of Teavana® Shaken Iced Passion Tango™ Tea, for a bright burst of hibiscus notes.

drink_name: Very Berry Hibiscus Starbucks Refreshers™ Beverage
drink_desc: Real fruit juice and whole blackberries shaken with Green Coffee Extract for a boost of natural energy, served over ice.
Sweet strawberry flavors are accented by passion fruit & acai notes and lightly caffeinated with Green Coffee Extract.
Real fruit juice, mint and a lime slice shaken with Green Coffee Extract for a boost of natural energy, served over ice.
The sweet blackberries and tart hibiscus of our Very Berry Hibiscus Starbucks Refreshers™ Beverage swirl together with creamy coconutmilk and ice, creating refreshing (and violet-hued!) sips.
